channel.title: Items wont go in shops
channel.description:
When i spawn an npc, i trade it everthing it goes good until i release nothing is in shop.. this is my codes.
Smithing_shop 1 1 2347 10000 2363 10000 2361 10000 2359 10000 2253 10000 2351 10000 2349 10000
My error now
Ddsspeced Is online on port 43594 - To change this message go nd search for 'ddsspeced is online' and change it..-Jayden Connection from localhost:4686 [client-1-Jesse]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: Fo 6 Smithing_shop" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Numb java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:456) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:80) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:33) at server.main(server.java:126)

item.title: Items wont go in shops
item.dc:creator: @ledgman ledgman
item.description:
@ledgman wrote:

You probably added the shops but never used tabs and used spaces,search for this in your shop.cfg
“46Smithing_shop222347” thats your problem, make sure you seperate all the shops and download notepad ++ i STRONGLY suggest.

Read full topic

item.title: Items wont go in shops
item.dc:creator: @vamp256 vamp256
item.description:
@vamp256 wrote:

try

shop = 22 General_Store 2 2 2347 10000 2363 10000 2361 10000 2359 10000 2253 10000 2351 10000 2349 10000

Replace = 22 with = Your shop id
